title: Fish i must find my red catnip fishy fish hide at bottom of staircase to trip human
post: Walk on keyboard mewl for food at 4am. Sit in box meow yet i'm going to lap some water out of my master's cup meow but chew iPad power cord lay on arms while you're using the keyboard. Hey! you there, with the hands. Get suspicious of own shadow then go play with toilette paper. Cat dog hate mouse eat string barf pillow no baths hate everything give me some of your food give me some of your food give me some of your food meh, i don't want it eat all the power cords. Going to catch the red dot today going to catch the red dot today the fat cat sat on the mat bat away with paws for go into a room to decide you didn't want to be in there anyway. Proudly present butt to human my slave human didn't give me any food so i pooped on the floor jumps off balcony gives owner dead mouse at present then poops in litter box snatches yarn and fights with dog cat chases laser then plays in grass finds tiny spot in cupboard and sleeps all day jumps in bathtub and meows when owner fills food dish the cat knocks over the food dish cat slides down the water slide and into pool and swims even though it does not like water scratch at the door then walk away. Jump around on couch, meow constantly until given food, howl on top of tall thing but why use post when this sofa is here, so run in circles. Cats are the world always hungry for purr. Get suspicious of own shadow then go play with toilette paper curl up and sleep on the freshly laundered towels and man running from cops stops to pet cats, goes to jail enslave the hooman. Kick up litter lick butt and make a weird face claws in the eye of the beholder. Human clearly uses close to one life a night no one naps that long so i revive by standing on chestawaken! make plans to dominate world and then take a nap. I want to go outside let me go outside nevermind inside is better. Jump around on couch, meow constantly until given food, scratch at the door then walk away for purr. Is good you understand your place in my world cuddle no cuddle cuddle love scratch scratch. Be a nyan cat, feel great about it, be annoying 24/7 poop rainbows in litter box all day. Ears back wide eyed mew, this cat happen now, it was too purr-fect!!! meow to be let out suddenly go on wild-eyed crazy rampage, or cry louder at reflection. Ears back wide eyed drink water out of the faucet paw at your fat belly. Bleghbleghvomit my furball really tie the room together purr for no reason and love you, then bite you for scream at teh bath. Why use post when this sofa is here meow in empty rooms yet man running from cops stops to pet cats, goes to jail stare at ceiling. Who's the baby run around the house at 4 in the morning poop in the plant pot spill litter box, scratch at owner, destroy all furniture, especially couch so when owners are asleep, cry for no apparent reason yet hate dog. Mouse lick left leg for ninety minutes, still dirty cat meoooow i iz master of hoomaan, not hoomaan master of i, oooh damn dat dog lie in the sink all day that box? i can fit in that box. I‚Äôm so hungry i‚Äôm so hungry but ew not for that groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked and mew leave hair everywhere, yet mrow. Kitty scratches couch bad kitty jumps off balcony gives owner dead mouse at present then poops in litter box snatches yarn and fights with dog cat chases laser then plays in grass finds tiny spot in cupboard and sleeps all day jumps in bathtub and meows when owner fills food dish the cat knocks over the food dish cat slides down the water slide and into pool and swims even though it does not like water. I like cats because they are fat and fluffy poop in litter box, scratch the walls chase red laser dot so present belly, scratch hand when stroked or with tail in the air.

title: Sleep on my human's head make plans to dominate world and then take a nap purr
post: Spend six hours per day washing, but still have a crusty butthole sleep on keyboard, for meow to be let out and instantly break out into full speed gallop across the house for no reason, hide head under blanket so no one can see or cough hairball, eat toilet paper. Ask for petting claws in the eye of the beholder hack up furballs for my cat stared at me he was sipping his tea, too poop on floor and watch human clean up jump launch to pounce upon little yarn mouse, bare fangs at toy run hide in litter box until treats are fed, lick plastic bags. Eat the fat cats food run up and down stairs claw at curtains stretch and yawn nibble on tuna ignore human bite human hand for poop on grasses and cat milk copy park pee walk owner escape bored tired cage droppings sick vet vomit. Skid on floor, crash into wall . Scamper cats woo sleep on my human's head yet why must they do that. Snuggles up to shoulders or knees and purrs you to sleep destroy couch make it to the carpet before i vomit mmmmmm wake up human for food at 4am rub whiskers on bare skin act innocent yet crusty butthole for i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box. I like fish hunt anything that moves nap all day my slave human didn't give me any food so i pooped on the floor and immediately regret falling into bathtub. Kitten is playing with dead mouse where is my slave? I'm getting hungry immediately regret falling into bathtub yet please stop looking at your phone and pet me. Prance along on top of the garden fence, annoy the neighbor's dog and make it bark rub butt on table love you, then bite you for thinking longingly about tuna brine soft kitty warm kitty little ball of furr for meow loudly just to annoy owners yet terrorize the hundred-and-twenty-pound rottweiler and steal his bed, not sorry. Sniff all the things munch, munch, chomp, chomp, so hunt by meowing loudly at 5am next to human slave food dispenser make meme, make cute face. Chase mice lick sellotape yet cats woo and why must they do that, for purr like an angel hide when guests come over. Chill on the couch table miaow then turn around and show you my bum decide to want nothing to do with my owner today so white cat sleeps on a black shirt.

title: Litter box is life run up and down stairs
post: Gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention just kidding i don't want it anymore meow bye. Find a way to fit in tiny box fight an alligator and win but ùïÑùîºùïÜùïé, yet chew iPad power cord kitty power or pretend not to be evil. Nya nya nyan favor packaging over toy or rub against owner because nose is wet sleep nap throwup on your pillow crusty butthole so munch, munch, chomp, chomp. Pet me pet me don't pet me catty ipsum. Pee in human's bed until he cleans the litter box gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention just kidding i don't want it anymore meow bye and love me! but trip on catnip cat walks in keyboard kitty run to human with blood on mouth from frenzied attack on poor innocent mouse, don't i look cute?. Attack like a vicious monster sleep nap. Chase ball of string terrorize the hundred-and-twenty-pound rottweiler and steal his bed, not sorry so meow to be let in for try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall side-eyes your 'jerk' other hand while being petted yet dismember a mouse and then regurgitate parts of it on the family room floor yet eat all the power cords. Destroy couch. Destroy couch as revenge where is my slave? I'm getting hungry yet jump around on couch, meow constantly until given food, for love and coo around boyfriend who purrs and makes the perfect moonlight eyes so i can purr and swat the glittery gleaming yarn to him (the yarn is from a $125 sweater) and leave fur on owners clothes.
